text: Koo shiliho shiabalindanga halali indukho ya ako? Inyanga yeyindukho yako iliula, abeyibilisia baliboola mbu; â€œToto Abarumwaba Nyasayewefubareraobwatoto. Koo khulikhwo nende abakhusabila, eshileshelo? Nohomba khukalusibwe khukhole kalia akakhulakholanga? Toto abo bamala okhusishia emioyo chiabu, ne akabachikhanga kabakorere
